channel.title: Dear Esther - Not sure if Game
channel.description:
This game is being argued as a non-game if that made sense.
Here check it out, I'm currently doing a series on the game and first episode is online on my channel: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VmpghitZpSE
This game has amazing scenery, It's perfection graphics wise, story is very interesting, mysterious and creepy.

item.title: Dear Esther - Not sure if Game
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

I seemed to enjoy it, but the ending was such a let down.

Read full topic
item.source: Dear Esther - Not sure if Game

item.title: Dear Esther - Not sure if Game
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

By definition, it is not a game. You explore an island and learn about a story. That’s literally it.

Read full topic
item.source: Dear Esther - Not sure if Game

item.title: Dear Esther - Not sure if Game
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

The scenery is just great, but it really doesn’t have a main idea or any other type of reasoning to why you are there.

Read full topic
